A.name: audit_tranche_period
A.description: The period, in seconds, between audit tranches

BI.name: min_balance_per_item
BI.description: The additional minimum balance required per item of elective service state

BL.name: min_balance_per_octet
BL.description: The additional minimum balance required per octet of elective service state

BS.name: basic_service_balance
BS.description: The basic minimum balance which all services require

D.name: preimage_expungement_period
D.description: The period in timeslots after which an unreferenced preimage may be expunged

E.name: epoch_length
E.description: The number of slots in an epoch

F.name: audit_bias_factor
F.description: The audit bias factor, expected additional auditors per no-show

GA.name: gas_alloc_accumulation
GA.description: The total gas allocated to a core for Accumulation

GI.name: gas_alloc_is_authorized
GI.description: The gas allocated to invoke a work-package Is-Authorized logic

GR.name: gas_alloc_refine
GR.description: The total gas allocated for a work-package Refine logic

GT.name: total_gas_alloc_accumulation
GT.description: The total gas allocated across all cores for Accumulation

H.name: recent_history_size
H.description: The size of recent history, in blocks

I.name: max_work_items_per_package
I.description: The maximum amount of work items in a package

J.name: max_number_of_dependencies_for_work_reports
J.description: The maximum amount of dependencies in a work report segment-root lookup dictionary and the number of pre-requisites for a work item

K.name: max_tickets_per_extrinsic
K.description: The maximum number of tickets which may be submitted in a single extrinsic

L.name: max_lookup_anchor_age
L.description: The maximum age in timeslots of the lookup anchor

N.name: max_ticket_entries_per_validator
N.description: The number of ticket entries per validator

O.name: max_authorizations_pool_items
O.description: The maximum number of items in the authorizations pool

Q.name: max_authorizations_queue_items
Q.description: The maximum number of items in the authorizations queue

R.name: validator_rotation_period
R.description: The rotation period of validator-core assignments, in timeslots

S.name: max_accumulation_queue_entries
S.description: The maximum number of entries in the accumulation queue

T.name: max_extrinsics_per_work_package
T.description: The maximum number of extrinsics in a work-package

U.name: work_replacement_period
U.description: The period in timeslots after which reported but unavailable work may be replaced

V_s.name: validators_super_majority
V_s.description: The number of validators required for a super-majority

WA.name: max_authorization_code_size
WA.description: The maximum size of authorization code in octets

WB.name: max_work_package_size_with_extrinsics
WB.description: The maximum size of an encoded work-package together with its extrinsic data and import implications, in octets

WC.name: max_service_code_size
WC.description: The maximum size of service code in octets

WE.name: erasure_coded_piece_size
WE.description: The basic size of erasure-coded pieces in octets

WG.name: segment_size
WG.description: The size of a segment in octets (WP * WE)

WM.name: max_imports_per_work_package
WM.description: The maximum number of imports in a work-package

WP.name: erasure_coded_pieces_per_segment
WP.description: The number of erasure-coded pieces in a segment

WR.name: max_work_report_size
WR.description: The maximum size of an encoded work-report in octets

WT.name: transfer_memo_size
WT.description: The size of a transfer memo in octets

WX.name: max_exports_per_work_package
WX.description: The maximum number of exports in a work-package

Y.name: ticket_submission_end_epoch_slot
Y.description: The number of slots into an epoch at which ticket-submission ends

ZA.name: pvm_dynamic_address_alignment_factor
ZA.description: The pvm dynamic address alignment factor

ZI.name: pvm_program_init_input_size
ZI.description: The standard pvm program initialization input data size

ZP.name: pvm_program_init_page_size
ZP.description: The standard pvm program initialization page size

ZQ.name: pvm_program_init_segment_size
ZQ.description: The standard pvm program initialization segment size
